content: *no tricky techniques just soothing stitches and a little bit of starlight in every row a subtle elevated rib gives just enough texture to keep things interesting while letting your yarn variegated or solid take center stage the ribbed fabric means a snug flexible fit that s effortlessly comfortable perfect for knitters who want something relaxing with a little bit of visual interest nothing too complicated just a lovely rhythm and a nod to falling stars * * top down cuff down * toe up * designed to show off both varigated and solid yarns * photo tutorial for dip stitch ribbing * photo tutorial for toe up short row heel **size** ---- small medium large **finished measurements** --------------------- foot circumference 7 8 9 inches/ 17 7 20 3 22 8 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/ 2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference **materials** --------- yarn pine and purl - classic sock 80% superwash merino 20% nylon 370 yards per 100 grams city of starlight colourway recommend needle size 1 set us #1 / 2 25 mm needles for knitting in the round **gauge** ----- 32 sts/ 44 row = 4 inches/ 10 cm in stockinette **pattern notes** ------------- work from chart or written instructions according to your preference
